data.title: Thank You!
data.body:
This site is dedicated to those who are interested in the small and yet important things. Without their help it wouldn't be possible to provide you [Manic][manic]. I would like to thank everyone for their support. | Designer | |:---:| | Luka Cvrk - Minimalistica (ported by [Mrisaacs][mri]) | | Tools Programmer | |:-:| | Valerio Proietti & MooTools Developers - MooTools
Dave Gamache - Skeleton
George Phillips - Content Preloader
Estevão Soares - Showdown | | Hosted on | |:-:| | Tom Preston-Werner & Chris Wanstrath & PJ Hyett - [GitHub] | [manic]: http://mrisaacs.github.io/manic [mri]: http://mrisaacs.github.io [GitHub]: https://github.com
